sentences.en: The next round of talks is tentatively scheduled to begin October 21st in Washington.
sentences.cn: 下一轮谈判初步定在10月21日于华盛顿进行。

sentences.en: Perhaps, he suggested tentatively, they should send for Dr. Esteves.
sentences.cn: 他犹犹豫豫地建议道，他们也许应该派人去请埃斯特维斯医生。

sentences.en: Several other mass extinctions in the geological record have been tentatively identified with large impacts, but none is so dramatic as the Cretaceous event.
sentences.cn: 地质记录中的其他几次大规模物种灭绝也被认为影响重大，但没有哪一次像白垩纪大灭绝那样夸张。
